basics.name: Matthew Jewell
basics.label: Software Development Consultant | Coder and Educator | Cloud Software Consultant
basics.summary:
I am an accomplished developer and software consultant, with over a decade of experience tucked under my belt, I bring a blend of enthusiasm and expertise to the world of web, application and services development. My journey has been a colourful one, from rolling up my sleeves as a hands-on developer to steering the ship as a CTO at cherryfish. What truly sparks joy in my work is sharing what I’ve learned; as a Typescript training consultant, I help development teams sharpen their skills and write more expressive, testable code.

Diving into the tech world, I've developed a focus on Typescript development, alongside other programming languages/frameworks such as Javascript, Python, React, Java, Kotlin, Ruby on Rails and GraphQL.

Alongside the programming languages, I'm a native English speaker, with fluent German, and happy to work in either English or German-speaking teams.

work.name: Matthew Jewell Consulting
highlights: Steered startups from concept to launch, actively contributing code and shipping customer-centric features.
Built scalable MVPs, customized software solutions, and bolstered development team performance.
Delivered expert Typescript training to enhance team proficiency and code quality.
Provided strategic advice to startup founders, facilitating smart scaling and market positioning.
work.summary: Bringing a dynamic blend of technical expertise and business acumen, I serve as a hands-on consultant and developer, dedicated to guiding startups through their entire lifecycle. My approach is two-fold: I actively engage in writing code and crafting features that resonate with users, while also providing strategic insights that propel companies forward. Specializing in MVP construction and team development, my consultancy elevates team capabilities with a focus on Typescript, driving code excellence across projects.

work.name: Equal Experts
highlights: Directed a seamless transition of PPRO's financial system to a cloud-native, serverless platform.
work.summary: My consultancy with Equal Experts was marked by a pivotal migration project for PPRO, facilitating a seamless transition of their transaction-heavy financial reconciliation system to a modern, cloud-native, serverless architecture.

work.name: cherryfish.me
highlights: Orchestrated the development of an HR platform that revolutionizes candidate-company matchmaking.
Integrated a robust tech stack, ensuring product scalability and implementing TDD/BDD methodologies.
work.summary: As CTO of cherryfish, I helmed the creation of an HR platform designed to redefine how companies discover and engage with talent. I led both strategy and execution, cultivating a product that excels in matching skill profiles with industry demands.

work.name: cherryfish.me
highlights: Accelerated product development by effectively bridging technical execution with founder vision.
Promoted a culture of collaboration, ensuring alignment of the development process with strategic goals.
work.summary: My initial role at cherryfish.me as a developer quickly evolved, and I became the essential conduit between our technical team and the founders, ensuring the product vision was realized with technical finesse and strategic insight.

work.name: INNOVITAS VITAE
highlights: Architected a comprehensive application stack, integrating advanced technologies and secure data solutions.
Drove innovation in medical data management and custom CRM integration.
work.summary: As the Tech Lead at i-Vitae, I had the privilege of architecting a robust tech stack that became the cornerstone of our healthcare application. My role involved not just building, but innovating, ensuring our platform met stringent medical data security and accessibility standards.

work.name: Startupbootcamp
highlights: Provided comprehensive technical mentoring to 12 international startups.
Assisted in the development and scaling of tech stacks tailored to individual startup needs.
Developed and executed digital strategy initiatives for sustainable business growth.
Engaged in hands-on code development and system architecture design.
work.summary: In my dynamic role as Entrepreneur In Residence for Technology at Startupbootcamp, I empowered a diverse cohort of 12 startups by guiding their technological growth and creating a resilient foundation for their businesses. I thrived on operating across multiple dimensions of their operations, from formulating high-level digital strategies to delving into code across a myriad of platforms.
technologies: AWS (Elastic Beanstalk, SES, S3, EC2, RDS)

work.name: Sainsbury's
highlights: Led internal software development projects with a focus on modernizing legacy systems.
Played a pivotal role in the transition from Waterfall to Agile methodologies.
Contributed to the formation and mentorship of Agile teams.
work.summary: At Sainsbury's, I was instrumental in advancing internal software projects by leveraging contemporary technologies like Node.js, React, and GraphQL, and integrating them within the AWS ecosystem. My tenure was marked by a significant shift from traditional Waterfall to Agile methodologies, during which I helped cultivate robust, Agile teams within the Manchester Store Support Centre.

work.name: The Electric Jukebox Company
work.summary: Developed UX prototypes and front-end for custom Android devices with agile methods using Angular.js, Cordova, AWS, and Jenkins.

work.name: Osper
work.summary: Led a code refactor and feature development for youth-focused finance apps using Cordova and Backbone.js, focusing on security and user experience.

work.name: Five Cool Ltd
work.summary: Created front-end components with Angular.js and D3, balancing customer feature requests with maintainable codebase in a scrum setting.

work.name: Maido
work.summary: Built web applications for brands like Jaguar Land Rover, Just Eat, integrating design and development with PHP and jQuery.

work.name: We Love Mobile
work.summary: Transitioned from intern to developer, crafting mobile experiences across diverse OS and devices, focusing on performance on low-powered devices.

references.name: Germán Fuentes Capella
references.reference: Matt joined our team for a strategic project that wasn't going the way we all wanted. He was instrumental in the efforts to turn it around to the success it is today. I am specially thankful for the engagement and ownership he displayed during our venture.

references.name: Christopher Schmacke
references.reference: Matt has an extremely extensive and excellent specialist knowledge, which he always used very confidently and successfully to complete his tasks. He became familiar with the area of responsibility assigned to him within a very short time. Matt proved to be a very resilient person and was always goal-oriented. He always impressed with qualitatively and quantitatively excellent results. In addition, Matt has always been a role model for his team. He led his team in a goal-oriented and objective manner and achieved a good increase in performance at a consistently high level as well as a good team atmosphere. Without him, the cherryfish app simply wouldn't exist.

references.name: Alessandro Scozzesi
references.reference: We met Matthew as digi-tech specialist at Startupbootcamp Digital Health Berlin. With his help we put our service online in less than 2 months. He does know how to work and accomplish tasks in a very fast and effective way. He's very well talented and fast learning. I explained him our "flow" and he gave me back technical suggestions an hour later on. Impressive. He loved get shit done rather than talking. Well done Matt.

references.name: George Wiscombe
references.reference: Matt is a talented engineer with a "can-do" attitude. He has an opinion, speaks up and gets stuff done.

references.name: Matteo Borgato
references.reference:
Matthew's amazed me with his fast tempo. He's a hard working, highly-skilled and talented UI Engineer. Great ability to understand the requirements and implement flexible and maintainable solutions. He's very meticulous in meeting the criteria required.

It's been great working with Matt and I'd recommend him as an asset to any development team.

references.name: Will Perring
references.reference: Matt came on board at Maido as a Junior Developer and quickly established himself as a valuable member of the team. His age belies his true capabilities; he grasps new concepts exceptionally quickly and soon progressed to planning and building his own large-scale projects for some big name clients, something I wouldn't normally expect from someone with twice his experience. Add to this his passion for new and emerging technologies and libraries - he always seems to know new, bleeding-edge products inside-out before anyone else - and you have not only an excellent developer but the foundations of someone who has the potential to make waves in the industry as a whole.

references.name: Andy Burgess
references.reference: Matthew is a very thoughtful developer that always ensures a high level of quality in his work. He is a joy to work with and is constantly looking for new ways to improve our working practices.

projects.name: Full Stack Engineer
projects.summary:
Led the creation of important features directly used by patients through AWS Lambda, GraphQL, and Node.js, which significantly enhanced communication and data handling between patients and healthcare providers. I was deeply involved with refining the GraphQL API, developing efficient queries and mutations that improved data operations, and overseeing a thorough refactor of the TypeScript codebase to heighten type safety and reduce errors, thus improving maintainability.

In addition to backend improvements, I was responsible for crafting intuitive user interface components using React, focusing on a seamless user experience. I also set up a suite of comprehensive tests, including both unit and integration tests, to ensure the frontend's reliability and performance. These contributions were instrumental in bolstering the application's robustness and enhancing the overall functionality of the platform.

projects.name: Full Stack Services and React Native Engineer
projects.summary:
Played a pivotal role in developing a high-performance MVP for a React Native app, focusing on creating fluid animations and a user experience that feels natural and engaging. My involvement covered end-to-end development, from conceptualizing the user interface to ensuring optimal performance on both iOS and Android platforms. I actively engaged in refining the app’s functionality, addressing user feedback to iteratively improve the product.

I also led the charge in establishing a resilient serverless backend architecture using Firebase and Google Cloud Platform. This included setting up secure, scalable cloud functions, managing real-time data with Firestore, and ensuring robust authentication processes. My commitment to clean code and maintainable structures was demonstrated through diligent UI testing and adherence to test-driven development principles. Through collaborative efforts and a strong focus on both user needs and technical excellence, the app has emerged as a reliable and user-friendly platform.

projects.name: Cloud Migration Consultant at PPRO GmbH
projects.summary:
As part of a dedicated team of Equal Experts consultants, I contributed to the seamless cloud migration of PPRO's financial reconciliation systems, crucial for processing high-volume transactions. Our collective efforts enabled a successful transition to AWS with meticulous planning to avoid any downtime. This collaboration not only preserved uninterrupted service during the migration but also led to a marked improvement in system performance and observability.

In tandem with the team, I was involved in rigorous end-to-end testing to confirm the reliability of the new cloud setup. My role also extended to refactoring the codebase, optimizing application performance for cloud efficiency, and enhancing scalability. This overhaul has provided PPRO with a more agile and scalable infrastructure, laying the groundwork for sustained growth and innovation in their financial services.

projects.name: Freelance Instructor
projects.summary:
As a Freelance Instructor at StartSteps, I played a pivotal role in developing digital proficiency among students through courses encompassing web development, data science, programming, and machine learning. My curriculum was thoughtfully structured to introduce front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as Python and SQL for backend proficiency. In the realm of data science, I focused on imparting practical knowledge of data manipulation and analysis using powerful libraries like Pandas and NumPy, establishing a strong foundation for data-driven problem solving.

My courses also delved into the essentials of machine learning, where students learned to implement predictive models with SciKit Learn and TensorFlow. I championed a dynamic learning environment that went beyond theoretical concepts, engaging students in hands-on projects that applied data science principles and machine learning techniques to real-world data sets. This approach ensured that students emerged well-equipped to venture into diverse tech sectors, with many finding success in web development, data analytics, and burgeoning AI fields, underpinned by the comprehensive programming, data science, and machine learning skills acquired through our sessions.

projects.name: Node.js Developer at aHead
projects.summary: Engineered a sophisticated notification system using Firebase Cloud Messaging integrated with Node.js/TypeScript to drive user engagement with personalized content delivery.

projects.name: Freelance React Native Developer
projects.summary:
While Bitwala was in the process of rebranding to Nuri, I functioned as a key member of a dynamic team of contractors focusing on the app's rebranding. Our mission was to seamlessly integrate a fresh visual identity into the existing application without disrupting the user experience or core functionality. The challenge was to ensure the UI overhaul complemented the ongoing delivery of new features by the core development team, thus requiring meticulous coordination and agile responsiveness to evolving project requirements.

My contribution specifically involved leveraging React Native to craft a rejuvenated user interface that resonated with the new design guidelines. While working in tandem with the core team, I helped assimilate new features and enhancements into the redesigned app, guaranteeing functional and visual coherence. This concerted effort by the contractor team played a crucial part in delivering a unified product that aligned with the strategic vision of Nuri's senior leadership, all the while supporting continuous improvement and feature expansion.

projects.name: Contributor to Chino open source SDK for Ruby
projects.summary: Enhanced the Chino SDK for Ruby by contributing to its security and performance features, emphasizing my commitment to open-source excellence and community collaboration.

projects.name: Infrastructure Engineer
projects.summary: Revamped Kenkou's infrastructure, embracing modern, secure technologies and setting a forward-thinking technological direction with tools like Node.js, Java Spring, and Elixir.

projects.name: Tech Consultant
projects.summary: Crafted an innovative Adobe After Effects plugin to streamline trailer production, incorporating a custom CSV parser and enhancing the integration process with Adobe Media Encoder.
